meanings.definition: The anniversary of the day on which a person was born.
meanings.sent2: She celebrated her birthday with a cake.
meanings.sent3: On his birthday, he wore a silly hat.
meanings.sent4: Her birthday was a ray of sunshine in a gloomy week.
meanings.sent5: The birthday party was full of laughter and joy.

meanings.definition: The day of the year on which a person was born.
meanings.sent1: We always have a family dinner on my birthday.
meanings.sent2: His birthday falls on a Saturday this year.
meanings.sent3: The cat's birthday was a surprise to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The birthday of spring brings new life to the world.
meanings.sent5: Celebrating your birthday is a special tradition.
